segments.text: Excuse me , can you show me the cloisonn bracelet in the counter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Let me get it for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you also show me this one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . This one is made of pure gold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think the cloisonn bracelet is more beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You â€™ re right . This one costs less , but is more beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the luster fade out after some time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Can I try it on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , the mirror is right here .
segments.speaker: S2
